original_text: The two pillars, and the two bowls of the chapiters that were on the top of the two pillars; and the two networks, to cover the two bowls of the chapiters which were upon the top of the pillars;
korean_text: 곧 기둥 둘과 그 기둥 꼭대기의 공 같은 머리 둘과 또 기둥 꼭대기의 공 같은 머리를 가리는 그물 둘과

sentences.original_text: and the two bowls of the chapiters
that were on the top of the two pillars
to cover the two bowls of the chapiters
sentences.korean_translation: 두 머리장식의 두 대야를 덮기 위한 것들

sentences.original_text: which were upon the top of the pillars
